changeSet.id: Trigger to remove query entity DE form record IDs when entity form association is severed
changeSet.sql: create trigger os_addrm_entity_record_ids after update on catissue_form_context for each row begin if (new.deleted_on is not null and old.deleted_on is null) then if (new.entity_type = 'CollectionProtocolExtension') then delete from os_cp_cust_fields where form_id = new.container_id and record_id in (select record_id from catissue_form_record_entry where form_ctxt_id = new.identifier); elseif (new.entity_type = 'Participant') then delete from os_cpr_extn_recs where form_id = new.container_id and record_id in (select record_id from catissue_form_record_entry where form_ctxt_id = new.identifier); elseif (new.entity_type = 'CommonParticipant') then delete from os_participant_extn_recs where form_id = new.container_id and record_id in (select record_id from catissue_form_record_entry where form_ctxt_id = new.identifier); elseif (new.entity_type = 'ParticipantExtension') then delete from os_cpr_cust_fields where form_id = new.container_id and record_id in (select record_id from catissue_form_record_entry where form_ctxt_id = new.identifier); elseif (new.entity_type = 'SpecimenCollectionGroup') then delete from os_visit_extn_recs where form_id = new.container_id and record_id in (select record_id from catissue_form_record_entry where form_ctxt_id = new.identifier); elseif (new.entity_type = 'VisitExtension') then delete from os_visit_cust_fields where form_id = new.container_id and record_id in (select record_id from catissue_form_record_entry where form_ctxt_id = new.identifier); elseif (new.entity_type = 'Specimen' || new.entity_type = 'SpecimenEvent') then delete from os_spmn_extn_recs where form_id = new.container_id and record_id in (select record_id from catissue_form_record_entry where form_ctxt_id = new.identifier); elseif (new.entity_type = 'SpecimenExtension') then delete from os_spmn_cust_fields where form_id = new.container_id and record_id in (select record_id from catissue_form_record_entry where form_ctxt_id = new.identifier); elseif (new.entity_type = 'OrderExtension') then delete from os_order_cust_fields where form_id = new.container_id and record_id in (select record_id from catissue_form_record_entry where form_ctxt_id = new.identifier); end if; elseif (new.deleted_on is null and old.deleted_on is not null) then if (new.entity_type = 'CollectionProtocolExtension') then insert into os_cp_cust_fields(cp_id, form_id, record_id) select re.object_id, new.container_id, re.record_id from catissue_form_record_entry re where re.activity_status = 'ACTIVE' and re.form_ctxt_id = new.identifier; elseif (new.entity_type = 'Participant') then insert into os_cpr_extn_recs(cpr_id, form_id, record_id) select re.object_id, new.container_id, re.record_id from catissue_form_record_entry re where re.activity_status = 'ACTIVE' and re.form_ctxt_id = new.identifier; elseif (new.entity_type = 'CommonParticipant') then insert into os_participant_extn_recs(participant_id, form_id, record_id) select re.object_id, new.container_id, re.record_id from catissue_form_record_entry re where re.activity_status = 'ACTIVE' and re.form_ctxt_id = new.identifier; elseif (new.entity_type = 'ParticipantExtension') then insert into os_cpr_cust_fields(cpr_id, form_id, record_id) select cpr.identifier as cpr_id, fc.container_id as form_id, re.record_id from catissue_form_record_entry re inner join catissue_form_context fc on fc.identifier = re.form_ctxt_id inner join catissue_participant p on p.identifier = re.object_id inner join catissue_coll_prot_reg cpr on (cpr.participant_id = p.identifier and (cpr.collection_protocol_id = fc.cp_id or fc.cp_id = -1)) where re.form_ctxt_id = new.identifier and re.activity_status = 'ACTIVE'; elseif (new.entity_type = 'SpecimenCollectionGroup') then insert into os_visit_extn_recs(visit_id, form_id, record_id) select re.object_id, new.container_id, re.record_id from catissue_form_record_entry re where re.activity_status = 'ACTIVE' and re.form_ctxt_id = new.identifier; elseif (new.entity_type = 'VisitExtension') then insert into os_visit_cust_fields(visit_id, form_id, record_id) select re.object_id, new.container_id, re.record_id from catissue_form_record_entry re where re.activity_status = 'ACTIVE' and re.form_ctxt_id = new.identifier; elseif (new.entity_type = 'Specimen' || new.entity_type = 'SpecimenEvent') then insert into os_spmn_extn_recs(specimen_id, form_id, record_id) select re.object_id, new.container_id, re.record_id from catissue_form_record_entry re where re.activity_status = 'ACTIVE' and re.form_ctxt_id = new.identifier; elseif (new.entity_type = 'SpecimenExtension') then insert into os_spmn_cust_fields(specimen_id, form_id, record_id) select re.object_id, new.container_id, re.record_id from catissue_form_record_entry re where re.activity_status = 'ACTIVE' and re.form_ctxt_id = new.identifier; elseif (new.entity_type = 'OrderExtension') then insert into os_order_cust_fields(order_id, form_id, record_id) select re.object_id, new.container_id, re.record_id from catissue_form_record_entry re where re.activity_status = 'ACTIVE' and re.form_ctxt_id = new.identifier; end if; end if; end; //
